The world of Art has been with human kind since the beginning of time. It has been gifted, traded, invested into, bought, sold and copied. It is as diverse as human cultures and it will be with us as a source of enjoyment, story telling, fame and fortune for centuries to come. Conversely, the world of technology and in particular blockchain represents the cutting edge of design and architecture. It presents us with unique opportunities we could only dream of just a few years ago. It is the aim of ArtChain to bring these two worlds together for the mutual benefit of all. The security that blockchain technology can apply, the globalization of artwork ownership and the promotion of young emerging artists are just a fraction of the exciting opportunities and goals ArtChain Global will deliver.
